.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx940_imm16_0533c2:

imm16
=====

An :ref:`integer_number<amdgpu_synid_integer_number>` or an :ref:`absolute_expression<amdgpu_synid_absolute_expression>`. The value must be in the range from -32768 to 65535.
